item.title: Hurricane Ida Relief and Support for South LA
item.description: Hurricane Ida made landfall on August 29, 2021 as a Category 4 hurricane, leaving devastation in its path. The residents of South Louisiana are resiliently making efforts to restore normalcy back to the communities that were damaged by the storm.

item.title: HOTWORX Honors Veterans, First Responders, and Gold Star Families at 2021 Franchise Convention
item.description: We recently held an auction during our annual franchise convention and it was our honor to present a check to SMRC with a donation of $34,375!
